Reported speech is talking about what someone has said.
To do this, we use the past tense of the verb.
He said he was watching us.
She said she didn't want to go to law school.
She told her that she could do it.
He told everyone that he was going on an adventure.
The donkey said he had eaten the princess.
Ron told Harry that Hagrid had been looking for him.
She asked him if he liked her.
